name: OshKosh Bgosh
description:
Here we have a pair of deck shoes made by OshKosh Bgosh in a Boys Size 11.
 They are brown and feature brown & yellow laces, white topstitching, a beige sole, and a two-eyelet shoelace closure.
 These loafers were made in China with synthetic man-made materials.
 They come to you in very good pre-owned condition with minimal playwear.
